changeSet.sql: select concept_source_id into @concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = 'ICD-10'; insert into concept_reference_term (creator,code,concept_source_id,uuid,date_created) values (4,'T10.0',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'T10.1',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S72.0',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S72.1',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S82.1',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S82.0',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S88.1',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'T13.6',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S88.0',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'T05.5',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S32.8',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'S82.0',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'T02.5',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'1915',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'1066',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'1065',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now()), (4,'1067',@concept_source_id,uuid(),now());
